transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, good morning sir.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha boliye sir. Hello
Executive: Kaise hai sir aap?
Customer: Hello
Customer: Ha aawaz aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ha aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ha
Executive: Ha sir kya sir dekho sir aap 10-10 share kar rahe ho aapka abhi 80000 baki hai.
Customer: Parivar nahi.
Customer: Parivar mein parivar kya hamare niji parivar mein death ho gayi.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir main main main aapko shishko wo kar raha hu sir koi issue nahi hai but aap socho sir ki 10-10 jahan pe aap agar aap 50000 bhi bechte na to main ek to bolta ki ha chalo theek hai baki kisi tarah se aap hamare online aap kar rahe kabhi 10000 kar rahe kabhi 20000 kar rahe ho to theek hai aap kar rahe ho lekin aapko daily basis pe karna chahiye sir kal bhi aapne nahi kiya.
Customer: Agar aapka 10-10 kar rahe hai koi issue nahi hai lekin.
Executive: Kal nahi aaya.
Customer: Kal nahi aaya aaj aayega tumhe.
Customer: Sir aap ek aadmi se haram haramkhor ek aadmi se payment lena tha wo phone hi nahi utha raha hai.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Nahi nahi koi baat nahi sir aap dekho sir issue nahi hai ki aap 10-10 jaise aap aa raha hai paisa hai waise aap kar rahe ho lekin sir mujhe bhi upar jawab dena hota hai ki aaj kitna kya hai kya nahi kyuki sir aapki service block ho jayegi to fir wo aapki business bhi nahi ho jayega.
Executive: To wo data pe aapka service wo ho jayega sir.
Executive: Jo aapne teen saal ka liya hai sir jo aapne payment kiya hai uske according fir aapki convert ho jayegi sir jo bhi service duration hai aapka timing hai to ek saal ke according fir wo aapki ho jayegi to fir dikkat ho jayegi na isliye main bol raha hu aaj kitna ho jayega sir aap bataiye aap aaj kitna kar rahe ho payment.
Customer: Sir abhi kal ki meeting mein se hum aaye hai hamari koi jab hum keh rahe hai ki hamare parivar mein death ho gayi.
Customer: Aisi majburi mein kya bol sakta hai aadmi aisi company ko jane do bhad mein.
Customer: Jab hamari parivar ki sthiti main aapko real bata raha hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Customer: Pehle dhanda hai parivar agar koi aisi ghatna ho jati hai pehle usko sambhalega aadmi aap batao.
Executive: Ha aap.
Customer: Aap naukri sambhaloge ya aapke parivar mein agar koi nahi nahi aap pehle naukri sambhaloge ya aapke parivar mein koi death ho jati hai uska.
Executive: Nahi main samajh sakta lekin sir dekho aap sahi bol rahe ho.
Executive: Okay pehle to main dekh mujhe problem aa rahi hai usko pehle dekhunga na lekin wohi main bol raha hu.
Customer: Problem hamare sath nahi nahi hum dekho hamare sath mein kya problem aayi hai hum usko rok nahi sakte.
Customer: Marne wale ko koi rok sakta hai kya?
Executive: Nahi sir koi.
Customer: Paise do din baad ya kal mar jana fir.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir wo.
Customer: Hamare jo nahi paramparik sanskar hai wo nahi karenge hum?
Executive: Nahi sir aap kijiye sir aap kijiye wo koi dikkat nahi hai aap theek hai aap daily basis pe kar rahe hain wo bhi hum accept kar rahe hain but sir kal bhi aapko karna chahiye tha aap hi batao nahi karna chahiye tha.
Customer: Nahi nahi ek hi din bol diya sir ji maine ek hi din bol diya Reena mam ko ek hi din bol diya kal hoti abhi band ho jaye service.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Jab hamari paristhiti humko hamari kya majburi hai hum kya jawab de sakte hain aapko.
Executive: Nahi sir majburi hai aapki muh se kya jawab de sakte hain.
Executive: Sir hum accept kar rahe hain ki aapki majburiyan hai main maan raha hu but sir aap aap hi dekho ki thoda sa isko bhi to aap rakhiyega sir kyuki ye bhi aapki business hai aur ye business agar non disample ho jayega to fir aapki aapki business pe problem create hoga na sir aap bhi paisa de rahe ho na to paisa de rahe ho is means ki aap business le rahe ho iska matlab.
Executive: To ultimately sir dekho business to business hota hai na sir wo business bhi aapke liye important hai aisa nahi hai ki business important nahi hai.
Customer: Jab nahi nahi important har cheez important hoti hai hone ko to par jab parivar mein agar koi aisi ghatna ho jati hai to uska bhi sab band sab kuch band ho jata hai.
Executive: Main manta hu main manta hu sir main kar raha hu.
Customer: Government chutti nahi karti agar koi maan lo aap dekhiye aap dekhiye government chutti nahi karti hai kya?
Executive: Karti hai na agar maan lo.
Executive: Ha ha main samajh sakta hu sir but aap ab aap batao sir ki aaj kya kitna ho jayega main actually mail drop karke main aaj sara mention kar dunga jo aapne baat kari hai.
Customer: Nahi abhi to din uga hai.
Customer: Jab hum kal ki meeting se free hoke aaye hai thodi hamari bhi to koi majburiyan hoti hai na.
Executive: Sir majburiyan main parivar ke sanskar mein paise walon se baat kare ya nahi kisi koi rishtedar hamare paas dua ke baith raha ho unse baat kare ya pehle aap batao kaun sa kaam kare.
Executive: Sir main main accept kar raha hu is cheez ko lekin sir upar wale jo baithe hain jo time table hai uske according bhi to sir.
Customer: Upar walon ko ye bolo bhai is samay mein kya bol sakta hu samne wale ko jab samne wale ko position ye hai ki main baat kar nahi sakta hu.
Executive: I know sir main aap hi batao India mart chhoti company nahi hai sabki hargiz hai aur hum de rahe hain to log humse puchhenge ki aapke client aapne deal nahi ki.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has 80,000 rupees due.

- Customer's family member passed away.

- Customer says executive is asking for payment.

- Customer says executive is harassing him.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged customer's family emergency.

- Executive explained the importance of timely payments.

- Executive said he will drop a mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will drop a mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, dues, family death, business, service
